alert.note: Alert for Holmes (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 12 at 3:13AM CDT until March 17 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 AM CDT FOR LEAKE...SOUTHEASTERN HOLMES...SOUTH CENTRAL CARROLL...ATTALA... NORTHWESTERN SCOTT...NORTHEASTERN YAZOO AND NORTHEASTERN MADISON COUNTIES... At 312 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Possumneck to Pickens to 6 miles north of Phoenix, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Pickens, Cameron, Hesterville, Possumneck and Mcadams around 320 AM CDT. Kosciusko, Camden and Newport around 325 AM CDT. Thomastown around 330 AM CDT. Smyrna around 335 AM CDT. Carthage and Singleton around 340 AM CDT. Zama and Renfroe around 345 AM CDT. Canton around 350 AM CDT. Edinburg and Madden around 355 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Walnut Grove, Ethel, Sallis, Redwater, Standing Pine, West, Lena and Mccool. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
